descriptions.description: Gulab jamun, a beloved Indian sweet, are soft, milk-based dough balls deep-fried until golden brown and then soaked in a sweet, rose-flavored syrup, often served warm. (1 box ‚ùå 10 pieces)

Indulge in a symphony of flavors with our "Rajdhanwar Veg Thali," a vibrant platter of regional specialties, featuring a medley of flavorful curries, aromatic rice, fresh roti, and delightful accompaniments, all served on a traditional thali.

Jalebi is a popular Indian sweet snack, a spiral-shaped, crispy, and juicy treat made with all-purpose flour, gram flour, and sugar syrup, often flavored with saffron and cardamom. These crispy, spiral-shaped Indian sweets are soaked in a sweet, fragrant sugar syrup, offering a delightful combination of textures and flavors.

Our Biryani is India famous Kolkata biryani. Kolkata biryani is a type of biryani that originated in the Indian city of Kolkata. It is a dish that is made with Indian spices, rice, and meat, and is known for its rich and flavorful taste. The dish is typically made with basmati rice, meat, and a variety of spices, and is often served with a side of raita or salad.
